title: Black Moon Chronicles Soundtrack [ Darder ]
description:
Black Moon Chronicles

Songs extracted from Black Moon Chronicles, Pc Game - Cryo, 1999.

Original Soundtrack by Pierre Esteve (also Atlantis II); a genius.

The original soundtrack Music Cd contains Extra song Land of Witches (6 minutes)


The Black Moon Chronicles world begins in comic of same name by Francois Marcela-Froideval , and go on in stratetegy PC Game by Cryo and in MMORPG in comic style that was finally cancelled.

Text from SynSoniq Records - www.synsoniq.de

Extend the adventure through the audio album of the official soundtrack of "Chronicles of the black moon." Titanic opera for symphonic orchestra, percussions and mixte choir, the music composed by Pierre Esteve is a work that can't be ignored for all lovers of epic and heroÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¯c fantasy. The chorus of angels and the telluric thundered of drums combined with the furor of brass instruments create the musical shock and sing the destiny of Wismerhill.
